menuItems.text: Accept payments via your Telegram bot and website
menuItems.response_text: Now you can accept payments directly through your Telegram bot and website! We offer a convenient and secure way to receive funds instantly into your business account from top banks, including payments from international cards for your goods/services. Why is this beneficial? 1. Convenience — accept payments directly via Telegram and website without unnecessary complications. 2. Security — all transactions are protected, ensuring the safety of your funds and data. 3. Easy integration — simple setup to start using it for your business. 4. Instant transfers — funds are credited to your account immediately after the transaction. 5. Multiple payment methods — support for a variety of payment options, including cards, e-wallets, and more. Your customers can now quickly and securely pay for goods and services via a user-friendly interface in Telegram or on the website. Start accepting payments today and grow your business! Special Offer: The first payment for the service is $38 per month for the first year, and the next year is free! Fill out the application and get access.

menuItems.text: How to Get Up to $500 Back on Advertising
menuItems.response_text: Important Information About Domain Names and Yandex.Direct Promotions! Did you know that Yandex.Direct often runs promotions where you can get up to $500 for advertising? 💰 This is a great opportunity to save money and attract more clients! But there is one crucial BUT: if your website uses a third-level domain name, you won’t be able to participate in these promotions and may lose money. To avoid this, check your domain name. Using a second-level domain not only allows you to participate in promotions but also makes your website look more professional and trustworthy.
